reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could not let this go w/o review.
reviews.reviewText: Over the years of phones recognizing the face or fingerprint, I've never been able to connect. I've bought Supersheild glass screen protector in the past, but not in recent years. I've typically gone with a very overpriced product which warrants their glass for lifetime. Great marketing, but the process of getting a replacement is burdening. I put off contacting them because of all the things one goes through to get a broken glass replaced for the costly price that's paid. I felt some amount of fear about dropping a new phone. The returning process just wasn't worth it. I've made my last purchase from them. Ever. Upside, I did receive a plastic guide from that purchase that lays over my phone which helped to apply the Supersheild screen protector. It's clear, went right into place, and had very few bubbles. By the next day the glass had relaxed enough that great adhesion made the view beautiful. I just cannot say enough about the quality. I know this sounds light years behind everyone, but for my phone to recognize my face or be able to discern my fingerprint is awesome. No my phone did not do an update. This is not the only phone that could not detect either. I've had both iOS and Android. I've experienced two different android phone makers that would never work. I was amazed that after applying the SS protector, my phone recognized my face! Not believing it was real, it worked with my fingerprint too. I did have to go through the fingerprint settings again which is instructed by Supersheild. Regarding how long this will last, no one knows. I only know that the other brand may have been thicker, but it broke fairly quickly. I do use good impact resistant phone covers, so know how much I tried not to go through the company for a return. 🙄 don't ask why I kept buying them. BTW, these broken screen protectors are glass and will put tiny cuts on your fingers. Cost high or low. I really wished I had purchased these screen protectors months and months ago. Plus you get 3 screen protectors! I hope this helps you make a solid decision and satisfied purchase. I did and I won't ever be zig-zag'd about my tempered glass purchases again. The Supersheild company is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy application; same fingerprint woes
reviews.reviewText: Doing quick research into all Pixel 7 screen covers, show that they all can have issues with the fingerprint reader. Seems more like an issue with other hardware. My old Pixel 2 I upgraded from had the sensor on the back and no issues.Anyways, I did the same as everyone else and turned on the 'Screen Protector' setting and re-scanned my thumb. It works fairly well all things considered. I would say it doesn't take like 10% of the time at the very most. When it rejects, it can be frustrating, but again, it seems like any screen protector will cause these issues. This one went on really easy. No bubbles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice screen protector, does not work with fingerprint sensor
reviews.reviewText: I really like this screen protector. Works great, sits on the phone nicely (Pixel 7) however, it does not work with the fingerprint sensor/scanner at all. Some people recommended deleting the current fingerprints and re-doing them with this screen protector. I did just that. It worked for like half a day and then stopped working. It's frustrating because I use that feature the most. My previous protector, recommended by google, worked great. I think I will have to re-purchase the one from google because I really want this sensor to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This review is for the Pixel 8 product. I have used this exact same product on an older Pixel and went through 6 of these protectors on the same phone. They did their job all 6 times cracking but the phone was not damaged. This latest install went fine though I did have a few bubbles that I had not experienced with the other phone. Happy to say they disappeared after one day. These protectors are cheap protection and relatively easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are some of the best for the price
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure why others don't give these 5 stars. I've bought these for my last 3 phones and they're perfect. They stay adhered to the screen, they go on easy, no bubbles when you do it right and they last. My last phone I had the same screen protector on for well over a year no problems. And YES, the pixel fingerprint scanner DOES work with these screen protectors. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a great fit but it works
reviews.reviewText: I've used supershieldz for all of my phones, and this was probably one of the least effective ones I've used. There's a significant gap between the edge of phone and the protector. I'm sure it will do its job, but with a case it just looks goofy. Had to redo my fingerprints to make the reader work. Make sure there's so dust at the fingerprint reader or else it will not work at all.Edit: fingerprint sensor is hit or miss. A damp finger is the only consistent way to unlock it. Kinda frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried about 3 different Pixel 8 glass screen protectors and ALL of them have bad adhesive on the sides of the screen. This is the ONLY one that works perfectly and have real adhesion on the sides!Sure if it came with a guide, that'll really help, but one of the other bad profit came with one that works with this product (lucky me) so installation was easy for me. The guides sticker that are included will work if you have patience tho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great after getting the finger print reader reconfigured
reviews.reviewText: Great high quality glass feel when installed. Seems to fit the phone well, though it seems it could be a bit better. Installation was relatively easy, although videos on YouTube seemed more helpful than the instructions included. I originally gave this 3 stars, since the fingerprint reader had a hard time reading through the screen protector. After many failed attempts to reset my fingerprint, I found that I was pressing a bit to hard during setup. It's still a bit fussy while trying to read through the protector, but works in two trys most of the time.

Las tenía en mi teléfono anterior y me funcionaron perfectamente. Tan resistentes son que nunca use todas en el paquete de 4. Para este teléfono decidí probar el protector de pantalla ZAGG que me ofrecían al momento de comprar el teléfono, al no tener experiencia con otros protectores fui víctima del marketing y la compré. El protector ZAGG me costó $1000 pesos aproximadamente y solo venía una sola! Lo peor es que me duró 3 días, a la primera pequeña caída se rayó bastante. Pedí estás después de ese incidente y sin duda me confirman de nuevo, estás son las mejores y a un buen precio.PD. El paquete para mí dispositivo anterior tenía un molde para colocar el protector de forma más precisa. Este no lo incluye 🥲

If you start with a perfectly clean screen, and keep it dust free before application...If you hold the protector right above the screen and aim to keep both index fingers and thumbs holding corners of the protector so that you can aim directly for the center...If you gently let it settle, centered, on the screen and let it start to adhere on its own and give it time to finish...If you then coax out any and all bubbles and see if it has actually adhered evenly from the edges on all sides...And if you then give it a few hours to one day to let all parts of it adhered to your phone...You WILL be able to put this protector on far more successfully than with others. Very few others are actually cut correctly.These are worth a shot. But you have to be careful and patient.

Not the first time I've gone with Supershieldz. Fits the Pixel 8 Pro perfectly, and just barely fits in the rim of my Spigen case. Was a definite pain to install though, and ended up having to toss the first screen protector due to bubbles from dust after a botched install.Unfortunately, Supershieldz seems to have dropped the quality over the years. The 3-pack from my last phone was purchased in 2018 for my then-new OnePlus, and the install was much smoother back then. I'd know, since I reapplied the leftover screen protector to the old phone right before doing it on the new Pixel.It mostly comes down to the install hardware they now include. The plastic film on the old protector had some resistance to it, which made sliding it around for alignment before sticking it down a breeze. The newer ones come with a very smooth film backing, which is smooth enough that even the camera bump on the Pixel 8 Pro causes it to slide off if you lift your fingers for a second. So, aligning the newer screen protector was a PAIN. And then, the newer backing generates so much static when peeled off that dust clings to it as soon as it's free. The old one wasn't nearly as bad.On top of that, the soft drying cloth they include in the newer kits is not only much smaller, it sheds significantly more material than the old one all over your freshly cleaned screen. Had to throw the first Pixel screen protector out since it was covered in dust by the time I was done with the "dust remover" pad on the screen. Bubbles galore, all caused by the cheaper install tools.After losing one of three screen protectors to dust generated by the install kit, and the fact these things used to boast a Lifetime Replacement Warranty that's no longer offered or even mentioned, it leaves me wondering if I'd have been better off buying the cheaper kits.

reviews.reviewTitle: Protege pero impide que lea la huella dactilar
reviews.reviewText: El protector de pantalla impide que el telefono pueda leer bien la huella dactilar para el desbloqueo de pantala, es necesario pasar el dedo mas de dos veces o incluso no lo reconoce, fuera de esto el protector cumple con proteger la pantalla del dispositivo.

I like these. Bought them to replace a different brand that was awful. The touch sensitivity with these is really good. They're scratch and bubble resistant. Unfortunately I suck at installing screen protectors, so I used all 3 and even the 3rd isn't right. That's the only thing I'm not happy about, but that's user error, not their fault.
